title: I've been using pixel 4 for a more than a half year. Recently i found my screen is flickering
content: I've been using pixel 4 for a more than a half year. Recently i found my screen is flickering when the screen was in a less bright situation, I checked online, someone mentioned I should brighter the screen it's gonna fixed the issue, I tried ,it works, but sometimes I can't always keep the screen super bright, and also if I turn off the smooth display, it will fix the issue as well. I think it's a hardware issue. How to repair my phone?
